short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents myGCC from automatically logging out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you have ever used my.gcc.edu for any extended period of time you will have noticed that your session expires after about 10 minutes if left idle. This can be highly annoying, especially if you find yourself accessing the site often. Luckily, Session Extender prevents this from happening and allows you to continue working without having to log back in every time you look away.
